Делал норм обзор, всем пофиг... Держите рецепт шаурмы.

Шаурма по-домашнему
Продукты (на 2 порции)
Лаваш тонкий - 2 листа
Куриное филе (крупное) - 1 шт.
Сыр твердый - 200-250 г
Капуста белокочанная - 150 г
Морковь по-корейски - 150 г
Огурцы маринованные - 2 небольших
Помидор свежий - 1 шт.
Майонез - 5-6 ст. ложек
Сметана - 2 ст. ложки
Зелень свежая (петрушка, укроп) - 0,5 небольшого пучка
Чеснок - 2-4 зубчика (по вкусу)
Масло растительное для жарки - 2 ст. ложки
Паприка молотая - 2 ч. л.
Перец кайенский - 1 щепотка (по вкусу)
Чеснок сушеный гранулированный - 1 ч. л.
Приправа для курицы - 2 ч. л.
Перец чёрный молотый - по вкусу
Соль - по вкусу

For a game that was created in 2011 it's really fun and addicting. The story is great and the workshop map option is amazing, the multiplayer is also great. This game also doesn't require a high end pc which makes it accessible to all players so that's cool. I'll say that this game is a 9.5/10 because it took me and my friend fifteen minutes just to disable the microphones for multiplayer.

Portal 1'den sonra daha uzun soluklu bir oyun gelmesi bekleniyordu çünkü Portal 1 çok kısaydı ve tadını damaklarda bıraktı. 2. oyun tam 4 yıl sonra çıktı ve oyun yapımcıları eline yüzüne bulaştırmadan oyunun hakkını vermiş. Grafikler neredeyse aynı desek yanlış olmaz ki gayet de yeterli bir seviyede. Mekanik ve mantık da aynı şekilde birinci oyun ile aynı seviyede. Var olanı bozmak yerine oyunu uzatıp biz oyunseverlere sunmuşlar. Bilmece/ bulmaca meraklılıkların aşırı derecede hoşuna gidecek bir yapım olan Portal serisini kesinlikle herkese tavsiye ediyorum.

Honestly here for the characters. The gameplay is fun, and most of the time its simple enough where you are not slaving at it for hours, yet it has cool mechanics you have to use. Very puzzle-y, but also lovely dialogue and story.

A satisfying and fun single player mode, hilariously enjoyable co-op mode, crazy amount of gameplay and puzzles with a built-in (but limited) puzzle editor w/ steam workshop implementation- It's one of the greatest games I've ever played and would totally recommend it to anyone looking for a fun experience that caters to pretty much everyone in some way or another.

The basic mechanic (retained from the first game) is so ingeniously simple that the game almost makes itself. What I mean is, the entire game-play loop is exhausted in the portal mechanic itself, leaving more or less the entire development process for Valve to do what they do best: wonderfully creative and clever level design. Additionally, the script is next-level hilarious and the AI protagonists are pure gold. You can tell the devs had loads of fun making it, and that definitely rubs off on the player. In short, it's a brilliant game, one of the few which transcend their genre: pretty much everyone who plays this will love it, not just fans of puzzle games.

Игра которая заставляет игрока думать что он умный.
Уже забытая классика. На этот раз уже полноценная игра, не на один вечер. Куча новых механик относительно первой части. Великолепная локализация, куча логических головоломок, отличный сюжет, харизматичные персонажи, игра однозначный шедевр. 10/10 боже! Уж 10 лет прошло пора бы Гейбу уже и третью часть выкатить. Жалко нет нормального интернета для того что бы попробовать кооператив.

One of the best games ever made, The portal games are games I come back to often because they are so good. The nostalgia I get from playing these games is unreal. I get memories of me sneaking down stairs and watching my older brother play the game in the computer room from the stairs on summer nights when it was past my bedtime. Just one of the best memories that this game has given me over the 10 plus years the game has been out.
